TopicTitle: What did you think about Elysium

Articles.Content:
Lol title speaks for itself.

I haven't seen it but...I wanna know if its cool and if i should watch it.
Entertaining dystopian action movie. Not earth shatteringly great, but I enjoyed it.

It is ok - worth seeing.

District 9 was better.

'twas good, Friend belives this is the future for earth.

I still have no idea how they have an atmosphere with no "visable" protection...
Artificial gravity works on atmospheres and the side barriers prevent it from flowing off the side.Stop the rotation at the air would most likely go.
I haven't watch it though.... Still finding the time to buy the movie
Do you think the film's director would have done a good job with a feature length Halo film?

I barely remember the plot. It's entertaining, sloppy and shallow approach to otherwise good thing such as socialism. Plus it's got sweaty Matt Damon, something I don't care about.

I'm not defending rich right winged douchebags, but the movie ended with joy and hope, although the fact is that the society was on the verge of global war and famine. Yay, everyone gains access to healing machines - now let's procreate more than ever! Awesome idea!

If only they've spent more time presenting the Stanford torus.
